title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Vehicle Drivers
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Vehicle Drivers 

Certificate of Professional Competence) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (vehicle driver certificate professional competence) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: 2. The European Communities (Vehicle Drivers Certificate of Professional
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Vehicle Drivers Certificate of Professional 

Competence) (No. 2) Regulations 2008 (S.I. No. 359 of 2008) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 2 – 

(i) 

by the substitution of the following for the definition of 
“Directive”: 

“ ‘Directive’ means Directive 2003/59 EC of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 15 July 20032 as amended 
by Directive (EU) 2018/645 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 18 April 2018 amending Directive 
2003/59/EC on the initial qualification and periodic training 
of drivers of certain road vehicles for the carriage of goods 
or passengers and Directive 2006/126/EC on driving 
licences1;”, and 

(ii) by the insertion of the following after the definition of 

“driving test”: 

“ ‘enforcement network’ means the network referred to in 
Article 10a of the Directive;”, and 

(b) by the insertion of the following after Regulation 21: 

“21A. (1) The Authority shall exchange information with other 
Member States in relation to CPCs through the enforcement 
network. 

(2) The information shared by the Authority through the 
enforcement network shall consist of – 

(a) 

information contained in the CPCs, and 

(b) details of training with respect to CPCs. 

1 OJ L 112, 2.5.2018, p.29. 
2 OJ L 226, 10.9.2003, p. 4. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [380] 3 

(3) Access in the State to the enforcement network shall be 
limited to the Authority and members of the Garda Síochána. 

(4) Processing of personal data by the persons referred to in 
paragraph (3) shall be solely for the purposes of verifying 
compliance with the Directive, in particular the requirements 
relating to training and shall comply with the requirements laid 
down in Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 April 20163 on the protection of natural 
persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the 
free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC4.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 July, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

3 OJ L 119, 4.5.2016, p. 1. 
4 OJ L 281, 23.11.1995, p. 31. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [380]

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Communities (Vehicle Drivers 
Certificate of Professional Competence) (No. 2) Regulations 2008 (No. 359 of 
2008) for the purpose of giving further effect to Directive (EU) 2018/645 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 18 April 2018. 

Point 6 of Article 1 of Directive (EU) 2018/645 provides for the exchange of 
information on CPCs between Member States through the establishment of an 
enforcement network. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [380] 5
